fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Give a player an Integration or Derivative Mark at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You may target Mathematics players with your abilities. Different effects happen based on when a marked player visits another marked player.

fields.name: Integration visits Integration:
fields.value:
If either of them dies tonight, their role will show up as “Integrated” in the graveyard.
Integration visits Derivative: The Derivative loses all Defense tonight and is considered to have been visited twice by the Integration.
Derivative visits Integration: The Derivative becomes “Solved 3 by 3”.
Derivative visits Derivative: The second Derivative is redirected to visit the first Derivative.

At the cost of 20 points, integrate all players with an Integration Mark, forcing all of them to visit a player of your choice. If they are Solved, all of their Solved visits will be forced onto that player.
At the cost of 20 points, derive all players with a Derivative Mark, killing any that has received at least 8 visits in the past.
